ServerResp.description: This object represents a server response containing simplified weekly gas measurement data.

Year.desciption: The year this measurement was taken.

Month.desciption: The month this measurement was taken.

Day.desciption: The day representing the start of the week for this measurement. Measurements are taken hourly and averaged together over a week.

Average.desciption: The average gas measurement recorded for the week.

IncSincePreIndustrial.desciption: The CO2 mole fraction difference in dry air (in parts-per-million) between this measurement and measurements from 1800.

Status.desciption: The status of the response. Currently either 'OK' or 'ERROR'.

RequestId.desciption: The identifier associated with this request.
